amendment.description: Amendment requires that, within 3 years of enactment of the bill, GAO must provide a report on whether the amount of funding for State administrative costs is appropriate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-444 to require GAO to audit/track the dollars and examine if the money allocated from administrative costs is appropriate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cassidy amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cassidy.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cassidy amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
